name: Trash Can Dungeon - Battle Against The ZOO
name_original: Trash Can Dungeon - Battle Against The ZOO
description:
This game is only available in Japanese.

2100BC, in Neo Tokyo, the sprawling city where millions live.
The cyborg patrol corp "Trash can" fights to keep the peace in a city where order is a thing of the past.
Its newest member Kei laments this world where all kindness is gone, and dreams of leaving Neo Tokyo.
But the evil secret society "The ZOO" is causing troubles, and there is no time for idle fancy.

2 short stories, each lasting around 20 minutes.
Crazy dungeon action RPG with speedy Time Progress Battles.

Enjoy the dynamic picture display and animations made possible by RPG Maker MZ.
